en.title: Siberian Cat Personality and Characteristics: The Charm of a Gentle and Intelligent Natural Breed
en.content:
The Siberian is a natural cat breed originating from the Siberian region of Russia. Having evolved naturally in harsh cold climates, it combines a sturdy body, luxurious coat, and a gentle, intelligent personality.

In this article, Fuluck Cattery, a specialized Siberian breeder based in Osaka, shares detailed insights about the Siberian's personality and characteristics based on hands-on breeding experience.

Basic Personality of the Siberian

Calm and Composed Temperament

The greatest charm of the Siberian is its gentle nature. They handle environmental changes with relative calm and tend to experience less stress when settling into a new home. At Fuluck Cattery, our cats are raised in a home environment alongside children and other animals, so kittens naturally become accustomed to everyday sounds and activities from an early age.

Dog-Like Loyalty

Siberians are often called "dog-like cats" due to their strong loyalty to their owners. They come running when called by name and follow their owners around the house. They value their bond with family and often become especially affectionate after being left alone.

Highly Intelligent and Playful

Siberians are an extremely smart breed. They can remember where toys are hidden and even learn how to open doors. With their strong intellectual curiosity, they also enjoy puzzle feeders and other enrichment toys.

Physical Characteristics of the Siberian

Sturdy Build

Siberians are a medium to large cat breed, with adult males typically weighing 6-10 kg and females 4-7 kg. They have a solid, muscular build with excellent athletic ability. It is also characteristic that they take 3-5 years to fully mature.

Luxurious Triple Coat

They possess a three-layered coat adapted to Siberia's harsh cold. It consists of a water-resistant topcoat, an insulating middle coat, and a soft undercoat. This rich coat creates the Siberian's elegant appearance.

Who Is a Siberian Best Suited For?

Families Who Want a Cat

Siberians are a breed that gets along very well with children. Their gentle nature makes them relatively tolerant of children's energetic movements. At Fuluck Cattery, our cats are raised in an environment with children, so they can be welcomed into families with kids with confidence.

Those Considering Multi-Pet Households

With their sociable personality, Siberians tend to get along well with other cats and dogs. Even in homes with resident cats, they often adapt smoothly when proper introduction procedures are followed.

Those Concerned About Cat Allergies

Siberians are said to secrete less of the allergen Fel d1 compared to other breeds. For those who want a cat but are worried about allergies, this breed offers hope. However, since individual results vary, we recommend interacting with them during a visit to see for yourself.

Siberians at Fuluck Cattery

At Fuluck Cattery, we raise our Siberians with a focus on health management and socialization training. By living in a home environment with children and other animals, our kittens grow up to be gentle and friendly. We also conduct regular practice with showers, blow-drying, nail clipping, and ear cleaning, ensuring smooth post-adoption care.

In 2025, we received the Minna no Koneko Breeder Award with a perfect 5.00 review rating. Even first-time cat owners can feel at ease, as we offer ongoing support via LINE after adoption.

zh.title: 西伯利亚猫的性格与特点：温柔聪慧的天然猫种魅力
zh.content:
西伯利亚猫（Siberian）是原产于俄罗斯西伯利亚地区的天然猫种。在严酷的寒冷环境中自然进化而来，兼具强健的体魄、丰厚的被毛以及温和聪慧的性格。

本文由大阪专业繁育西伯利亚猫的福楽猫舍，根据繁育经验为您详细介绍西伯利亚猫的性格与特点。

西伯利亚猫的基本性格

温和沉稳的气质

西伯利亚猫最大的魅力在于其温和的性格。它们对环境变化相对从容，到新家后也不容易产生应激反应。在福楽猫舍，猫咪们与孩子和其他动物一起在家庭环境中成长，因此幼猫从小就自然适应了日常生活中的各种声音和动静。

犬般的忠诚

西伯利亚猫也被称为“像狗一样的猫”，对主人的忠诚度很高。叫它名字会跑过来，还会跟着主人在家里走来走去。它们重视与家人的纽带，独自在家后往往会格外撒娇。

高智商且爱玩

西伯利亚猫是非常聪明的猫种。它们能记住玩具藏在哪里，甚至学会开门。因为求知欲旺盛，益智喂食器等智力玩具也能让它们乐在其中。

西伯利亚猫的体型特征

结实健壮的体格

西伯利亚猫是中大型猫种，成年公猫体重约6-10公斤，母猫约4-7公斤。骨架粗壮、肌肉发达，运动能力出色。完全成熟需要3-5年也是其特点之一。

丰厚的三层被毛

它们拥有适应西伯利亚严寒的三层被毛结构：防水的外层毛、保暖的中层毛和柔软的底层绒毛。这丰厚的被毛造就了西伯利亚猫优雅的外观。

西伯利亚猫适合哪些人？

想养猫的家庭

西伯利亚猫与孩子相处非常融洽。性格温和，对孩子活泼的动作也比较包容。福楽猫舍的猫咪在有孩子的环境中成长，因此有小朋友的家庭也可以放心迎接。

考虑多宠家庭的人

西伯利亚猫性格随和，容易与其他猫咪和狗狗相处融洽。即使家中已有先住猫，只要按照正确的引见步骤操作，通常都能顺利适应。

担心猫过敏的人

西伯利亚猫据称比其他猫种分泌更少的过敏原（Fel d1）。对于想养猫但担心过敏的人来说，这是一个带来希望的猫种。但由于存在个体差异，建议在参观时实际接触后再做判断。

福楽猫舍的西伯利亚猫

福楽猫舍注重健康管理和社会化训练来培育西伯利亚猫。通过在家庭环境中与孩子和其他动物一起生活，我们的幼猫成长为温顺亲人的小猫咪。日常还会进行淋浴、吹风、剪指甲、清洁耳朵等练习，确保接猫后的护理也能顺利进行。

2025年我们荣获“大家的小猫繁育者大奖”，口碑评分5.00。即使是第一次养猫的朋友，接猫后也可以随时通过LINE咨询，请放心交给我们。
